WorkItem.Description:
Hi, 
  I am using this SVG.dll to convert SVG image to PNG to later insert the image to Powerpoint presentation. I am getting very good results with text rendering but graph in the image is blurred.  Attached image resulted from conversion. When I open the SVG file in IE/FF/Chrome it looks good.  But Safari also shows svg with graph blurred. 
  Is that an issue with original SVG image or the svg.dll library? Any ideas how I can fix this? 


Code:
SvgDocument svg = SvgDocument.Open(imagePath);
svg.Draw().Save(imagePath + ".jpg", ImageFormat.Jpeg);

thanks
WorkItem.Summary: image parts blurred on converting from svg to PNG/GIF/JPEG

Comments.Message:
Hi,

I have same problem when i am converting SVG to PNG  , Error NullReferenceException  throwing.

SvgDocument svg = SvgDocument.Open(imagePath);  //NullReferenceException  
svg.Draw().Save(imagePath + ".jpg", ImageFormat.Jpeg);

Pls, suggest how to fix, even i am using SVG 5.2 dll.

Thanks
